title: Video game industry 's wealthiest entrepreneurs 2016
yAxis: Net worth in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net worth in billion U.S. dollars for 5 number of Entrepreneur (company)s.
Entrepreneur (company) Ma Huateng (Tencent) has the highest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars and Kim Jung-Ju (Nexon) has the lowest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 18.4 between the maximum Entrepreneur (company) Ma Huateng (Tencent) and minimum Entrepreneur (company) Kim Jung-Ju (Nexon).

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net worth in billion U.S. dollars for 5 number of Entrepreneur (company)s.
Entrepreneur (company) Ma Huateng (Tencent) has the highest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars and Kim Jung-Ju (Nexon) has the lowest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars.
The second highest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Entrepreneur (company) William Ding (NetEase).
There is a difference of 18.4 between the maximum Entrepreneur (company) Ma Huateng (Tencent) and minimum Entrepreneur (company) Kim Jung-Ju (Nexon).
Net worth in billion U.S. dollars at Entrepreneur (company) Ma Huateng (Tencent) is 21.9 , second place is William Ding (NetEase) at 11.5, and thirdly is Shi Yuzhu (Giant Interactive) at 5.4.
The lowest value 3.5 at Kim Jung-Ju (Nexon) is almost 2.32 times smaller than the average value 9.44.
